data.title: Not worth it!
data.text:
Had dinner here and the food was bad in every way. Order soup to start it wasn't hot barely warm. We sent it back and finally got some reheated soup that was hot. When our meal arrived steak was over cooked baked potato was not hot. 
Sent it back and the steak was ice cold inside sent it back and decided to not try again. The salads were also bad. The other friend steak was over cooked but they decided to eat it anyway. 
This entire experience was very disappointing the manager or chef never even came to our table. I don't know what happened the entire experience was just bad.

data.title: Wonderful!
data.text: We ate here on evening on an overnight stay. They had a special which even included a bottle of wine.  Our bone in filets were awesome. Service and food were excellent. Highly recommend.

data.title: What a pleasant surprise in a casino
data.text: The food was very good, I loved the fall special dinner for two and a bottle of wine - you can't go wrong with that!  Very nice restaurant, the wait staff is on point.  A very relaxing and enjoyable dinner.

data.title: Fine Dining
data.text:
Once again, we enjoyed another great meal at Jimmy's. 
Service was excellent, steaks were perfect and I have to give a shout out about the quail legs and grilled shrimp served on the garlic grits. This time the steak had the bone in it. The crab cakes are fabulous, the salad is always fresh and the baked potato was huge. I also ordered the mushrooms to put on top of my steak. The wine that comes with the meal was nice.

data.title: Oh So Elegant
data.text: To my way of thinking, this is the best place to eat in Shreveport!  The decor is 'Rat Pack' reminiscent with a wonderful wine list that has something memorable for everyone! As fantastic as the steaks are, I think the seafood is even better!

data.title: My birthday dinner!
data.text: What a wonderful night.  We started with these appetizers:  Squash Bisque, Coconut Shrimp and the Crabtini-All were delicious.  Then all 3 of us got a filet special that would have been great but the sauce was not good but we were able to scrape that off.  The steaks came with grilled asparagus, augratin potatoes and  a tomato wedge with melted cheese.  Then for my birthday I got a huge piece of cheesecake big enough for all three of us to share.  We had so much food we had to get a box to go.  Oh the bread basket has three different kinds of bread with different butters to try.  All wonderful.  We will go back.  In fact my girlfriend and I are going the end of this month for another celebration of my birthday.  Can't wait.

data.title: great burgers
data.text: after the disappointing buffet the night before, we went there for supper the next night.  The menu was a little pricey, but at least the food was worth it.  Our server was wonderful and attentive.  great cheeseburgers and fries

owner_response.author: Mimi F, Guest Relations Manager at Jimmy's Seafood & Steak, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Aloha Great!

Thank you for taking time to provide a review of Margaritaville Restaurant on TripAdvisor.  We truly appreciate your wonderful comments on the cheeseburger and fries you enjoyed.  

Have a Great Day!

Sincerely,
Mimi F., Guest Experience Manager
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: We will go back!
data.text: My husband and I rarely get a night out and we will make a point to go back asap! We had reservations and were seated early with no problem. The staff was very attentive, friendly and courteous. The decor was lovely and the views of the river were beautiful.  We ordered the stuffed duroc (?sp) chop and the stuffed shrimp along with two sides- marinated mushrooms and Brussels sprouts.  Both entrees were delicious although I thought the stuffed pork chops were the best.  I would recommend Jimmys to friends and family and cannot wait to go back!

owner_response.author: Mimi F, Guest Relations Manager at Jimmy's Seafood & Steak, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Aloha We!

Thank you for taking time to write a review of Jimmy's Seafood & Steakhouse here at Margaritaville Resort Casino on TripAdvisor.  Our culinary crew members truly appreciate receiving such glowing reviews from our guests.  We hope that upon your return you enjoy their culinary creations just as much.

Have a great day!

Sincerely,
Mimi F., Guest Experience Manager
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: state conference
data.text: Service & food were very good.   We had a party of 6 and we were sat immediately and offered drinks and appetizers.   Food came out quickly

owner_response.author: Mimi F, Guest Relations Manager at Jimmy's Seafood & Steak, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Aloha State!

Thank you for your 4 star review of Jimmy's Seafood & Steakhouse on TripAdvisor. We are so pleased you enjoyed yourself and that you appreciate our casual elegance and island style service. Please come back soon for more fun in Paradise.

Sincerely,
Mimi F., Guest Experience Manager
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Best in Shreveport - Maybe
data.text: Great ambience is just the start.  Food is well portioned, tasty and artistically served.  Wait staff is fantastic.  Wine and drinks are numerous and fairly priced.  You don't have to dress up because you'll be with casino folks.  This is consistently the best food, service and price in town.

owner_response.author: Mimi F, Guest Relations Manager at Jimmy's Seafood & Steak, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Aloha Best!

Thank you for your 5 star review of Jimmy's Seafood & Steakhouse on TripAdvisor. We are so pleased you enjoyed yourself and that you appreciate our casual elegance and island style service. Please come back soon for more fun in Paradise.

Sincerely,
Mimi F., Guest Experience Manager
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Excellent Dining at Jimmy's
data.text:
We took advantage of the special spring menu that was $99.00 for 2.
I started out my meal with the grilled quail over the stoneground grits and with 2 shrimp on the side. It was spectacular! I chose the spring salad with the smoked applewood bacon. It was topped off with homemade croutons. I was not impressed with my sea bass that was served whole. Although the table side presentation was excellent, I was hoping to get a thicker piece of fish. Lauren, our waitress was fantastic. I finished up my meal with the toffee bread pudding. I am still craving it months later. Our meal was comped for the evening. The atmosphere was lively and fun. Other family members raved about the shrimp cocktail, the crab cakes, and the steaks. We will dine at Jimmy's every time we go to the casino.

owner_response.author: Mimi F, Guest Relations Manager at Jimmy's Seafood & Steak, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Aloha Excellent!

We want to thank you for writing a review of your experience at Jimmy's Seafood and Steakhouse here at Margaritaville Resort Casino and for posting it on TripAdvisor for other travelers to view.  We are so glad you found our property to be comfortable and the service to be friendly and courteous.

Come back soon to experience our corner of Paradise again.

Sincerely,
Mimi F., Guest Experience Manager
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Great Atmosphere
data.text: We ate dinner on a Monday night... It was good, but I have had better food.   The steak I had was a little under cooked and there was hardly any flavor.  The baked potato was great!!  I would definitely try it again!!!

owner_response.author: Mimi F, Guest Relations Manager at Jimmy's Seafood & Steak, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Aloha Great!

Thank you for taking time to provide a review of Jimmy's Seafood and Steakhouse on TripAdvisor.  We will work to make this better for you in the future and are pleased you enjoyed the food and the service.  

Have a Great Day!

Sincerely,
Mimi F., Guest Experience Manager
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Great Dinner
data.text: My husband and I ate here for dinner recently, and we really enjoyed it.  The bread basket (although it didn't arrive until after our food came out) was amazing!  I ordered the filet with the mac and cheese.  The filet was a little over cooked, but the mac and cheese was delicious.  My husband got the special which was snapper and jumbo shrimp, and he was very pleased with his choice.  We both enjoyed the atmosphere and getting to enjoy views of the river while dining.  We would definitely eat here again next time we are in town.

owner_response.author: Mimi F, Guest Relations Manager at Jimmy's Seafood & Steak, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Aloha Great!

We wanted to take a moment to say thank you for your super review of Jimmy's Seafood and Steakhouse here at Margaritaville Resort Casino on TripAdvisor.  We hope you will return soon to enjoy more of our corner of Paradise.  Our crew members are waiting to provide the excellent service you deserve.

Have a great day!

Sincerely,
Mimi F., Guest Experience Manager
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Wonderful wine list
data.text:
We reserved a table last week and had planned to order their $99 spring special/ a.three course for two with a bottle of wine.

My husband spotted a bottle from their wine list so we went another route.

Great bottle. I oredered the guerrere au grautin califlower which was divine. And the stuffed shrimp....stuffed with crabmeat and bacon wrapped. Yummy and soooooooo rich. My hisband ordered  the seafood gumbo and a steak. Cooked to perfection!

A very nice restaurant. Lovely decor with a very approachable staff.
Highly recommendn for a date night restaurant.

owner_response.author: Mimi F, Guest Relations Manager at Jimmy's Seafood & Steak, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Aloha Wonderful!

Thank you so very much for your positive review of Jimmy's Seafood & Steakhouse here at Margaritaville Resort Casino on TripAdvisor. We truly appreciate your comments regarding the service and kindness you received from your server in this restaurant. 

We look forward to your return in the near future.

Mimi F., Guest Experience Manager
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Don't get the special
data.text: So I almost never get a pre fixed menu.  They offer 2 dinners for 99 with a bottle of wine.  The wine is the best part of the meal.    The soup was a bit watery.  The ribeye was quite possibly worst than the sizzler.  I assume that the regular ribeye would be much better than the special.  I will update the review after another trip.

owner_response.author: Mimi F, Guest Relations Manager at Jimmy's Seafood & Steak, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Aloha Don't!

Thank you for writing a review of Jimmy's here at Margaritaville Resort Casino on TripAdvisor.  We want to apologize to you for an experience that was less than expected.  Jimmy's generally receives excellent reviews for its service and the quality of food.  I will forward to our culinary staff for review and correction.

Sincerely,
Mimi F., Guest Experience Manager
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Delicious
data.text: Our party of four ate at Jimmy's last night after a day in the casino. We have been to the buffet often and find it to be rather hit or miss.  We decided to go last minute and had not packed for a nicer restaurant. My husband had jeans and a t-shirt and my brother-in-law was wearing shorts. We walked up and asked the host if they had a dress code and he very courteously said "not in paradise".  We were seated overlooking the river.  A basket with an assortment of delicious breads and plate with flavored butters was brought fairly quickly. My sister-in-law and I ordered salads which were both fresh.  My husband ordered the ribeye which was quite flavorful and cooked a beautiful medium as ordered and served with choice of side.  My sister-in-law and I ordered the bacon wrapped stuffed shrimp. They were huge we each had four shrimp on our plates and we were full after two.   They were in a word delicious!!  The shrimp were served over grits and a scrumptious Tasso gravy!  Yum!  Brother-in-law ordered the lamb and as I'm not a lamb eater I can't comment other than to say he said it was the best lamb he had ever eaten.  Our table also got a loaded baked potato and sugar snap peas sides. All were delicious. We ended the meal with a shared chocolate mousse cake, again amazingly delicious. Overall a wonderful meal and a great time. As a bonus two members of the staff sang to a table nearby so we had a bonus of great entertainment. Not sure what the previous poster meant regarding no sides. Each of our entrees had a small accompaniment plus you can order from a list of other delicious sides.   We can't wait to go back.

owner_response.author: Mimi F, Guest Relations Manager at Jimmy's Seafood & Steak, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Aloha Delicious!

What a wonderful review of Jimmy's Seafood & Steakhouse here at Margaritaville Resort Casino on TripAdvisor.  We are so pleased  you enjoyed the culinary delights offered in this restaurant together with the courtesy and friendly demeanor of the crew members you found here.

Come back soon and enjoy another meal in our corner of Paradise.

Sincerely,
Mimi F., Guest Experience Manager
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Dining At It's Finest
data.text: While staying in Shreveport we went to Margaritaville for a day to gamble and have dinner.  It was our good fortune to stop and read the menu outside Jimmy's.  The host, Justin, came over to speak to us.  He was friendly, professional and outgoing.  He answered our questions and invited us to come in without pressuring us.  We were seated and Paul was our waiter.  Paul was fantastic.  Informative, helpful, professional, and prompt along with being friendly and making you feel at home.  A great dining experience.  We had the salmon, Paul recommended, and it was so good I would compare it favorably to the fresh salmon from Lake Michigan.  It was that good.  If you're in Shreveport and want to have dinner, you can do no better than Jimmy's.  If he's there, ask Justin if Paul is available.  You will not be disappointed.

owner_response.author: Mimi F, Guest Relations Manager at Jimmy's Seafood & Steak, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Aloha Dining!

We want to thank you for writing a review of your experience here at Margaritaville Resort Casino and for posting it on TripAdvisor for other travelers to view. Jimmy's is one of the best Steakhouses in this area. We are so glad you found our property to be comfortable and the service to be friendly and courteous.

Come back soon to experience our corner of Paradise again.

Sincerely,
Mimi F., Guest Experience Manager
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Bland Empty and No T shirts and shorts PLEASE
data.text: My pallet isn't a professional taster but I have dined some of the best steakhouses and I know what this type of diner prefers. The crab cakes took awhile to arrive. The burned the first ones. Once it arrived it was tasteless. SaltGrass does better crab cakes. Shrimp cocktail had 4 large shrimp. According to Forrest Gump if we added a couple we could have had a shrimp cocktail. I ordered stuffed shrimp wrapped in bacon. Husband a ribeye medium well. His was still running red juices. Shrimp was over cooked. Bacon was very crisp. No sides were offered. Cocktail was offered no wine suggested. Had dessert put in a sack to go. Chocolate mousse cake with Oreo crust. Could have been from Costco. Cruise ship steakhouses offer better menu. And please put on your pants not shorts for the benefit of others. Save shorts for buffet.

owner_response.author: Mimi F, Guest Relations Manager at Jimmy's Seafood & Steak, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Dear Bland!

Thank you for your review and comments.  It is very important to us to see your comments and concerns to improve services for all our guests. In an effort to improve your next experience I have forwarded your comments to Chef for review.  We want to offer our apologies for an experience that was less than you expected. I have forwarded this review to management for review and correction and hope upon your return you find improvements that not only please you but delight you as well..  

We appreciate your comments.

Sincerely,
Mimi F., Guest Experience Manager
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: A night at Jimmy's
data.text: Wonderful food, great service, and reasonable prices and it all comes with a view if you get the tables overlooking the Red River and Cross Bayou.  Make sure you try their bread pudding!

owner_response.author: Mimi F, Guest Relations Manager at Jimmy's Seafood & Steak, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Aloha A Night!

Thank you so much for the wonderful review of Jimmy's Seafood & Steakhouse here at Margaritaville Resort Casino on TripAdvisor.  We are pleased that you enjoyed the venue and the quality of our culinary delights.  Especially the comment on the bread pudding.

Sincerely,
Mimi F., Guest Experience Manager
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Best Fine Dining in NW Louisiana
data.text: Great food and wine with equally excellent service.  The chef make the wonderfully flavored food that is beautiful on the plate.  The service staff is just simply the best.  The manager knows his wines and can help make the perfect pairing.  The view of the river is pretty.  The ambiance is fine.  My wife and i go here at least 2x a month for the best meal in the area.  Very similar to Vegas food and service without the pretense.  GO!  ENJOY!

owner_response.author: Mimi F, Guest Relations Manager at Jimmy's Seafood & Steak, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Aloha Best!

Thank you for your fabulous review of Jimmy's Seafood & Steakhouse here at Margaritaville Resort Casino on TripAdvisor.  We appreciate your compliments on the quality of food and service you have received in this venue and hope you will continue your twice monthly dinners here with us in Paradise.

Sincerely,
Mimi F., Guest Experience Manager
owner_response.title: Owner Response
